text: The Naz Male Health Alliance (NMHA), founded in Pakistan in 2011, is a non- governmental organization providing technical, financial, and institutional support for improving the sexual health, welfare and human rights of the country's LGBT community. It is the first and only LGBT community-based organisation in Pakistan of its kind. The Alliance provides support and guidance to groups and organisations offering direct services to the community. Health services include HIV/AIDS treatment and contraceptive information and distribution. == References == Category:LGBT rights Category:Transgender Category:LGBT rights in Pakistan Category:HIV/AIDS Category:2011 establishments in Asia Category:2010s establishments in Pakistan
title: Naz Male Health Alliance
